Interface AddressOwnerBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddressOwner
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ABContactPrimaryAddressOwner, AbstractAddressOwner, ContactPrimaryAddressOwner, SearchAddressOwner, SearchProximityAddressOwner, SecondaryAddressOwner
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface AddressOwnerBase
extends AddressOwner
